message: Why is everybody jumping to that conclusion. The article does not say that. Does anyone read anymore?

Brazil also needs a new Congress, given its tainting by corruption. An early general election requires a swift constitutional amendment. Next time they take to the streets, it is what Brazilians should call for. That would be a better way to defend democracy.
